Package com.hdmstuttgart.fluffybear.repository

Interface RecipeRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Recipe,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Recipe,​java.lang.Long>
public interface RecipeRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Recipe,​java.lang.Long>
Spring boot repository for Recipes which extends a CrudRepository

    • findById

      java.util.Optional<Recipe> findById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Returns a Recipe object from the connected database by a given id.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      the created Recipe object.

    • findByName

      java.util.List<Recipe> findByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a list of recipes identified by the name.
      Parameters:
      name - which is used for identifying recipes.
      Returns:

    • findByJsonParameters

      @Query("SELECT r FROM Recipe r WHERE r.totalTime <= :maxTime AND r.totalTime > :minTime AND r.category IN :category AND r.vegetarian = :vegetarian AND r.vegan = :vegan") java.util.List<Recipe> findByJsonParameters​(@Param("minTime") int minTime, @Param("maxTime") int maxTime, @Param("category") java.util.List<java.lang.String> category, @Param("vegetarian") boolean vegetarian, @Param("vegan") boolean vegan)
      Returns a list of filtered recipes. The filter values are defined by json parameters.
      Parameters:
      minTime - Minmal time of the recipe in minutes.
      maxTime - Maximum time of the recipe in minutes.
      category - List of all possible categories for the recipe.
      vegetarian - indicating if the recipe is vegetarian.
      vegan - indicating if the recipe is vegan.
      Returns:
      the filtered list of recipes

    • findByJsonParametersNoneVeganVegetarian

      @Query("SELECT r FROM Recipe r WHERE r.totalTime <= :maxTime AND r.totalTime > :minTime AND r.category IN :category ") java.util.List<Recipe> findByJsonParametersNoneVeganVegetarian​(@Param("minTime") int minTime, @Param("maxTime") int maxTime, @Param("category") java.util.List<java.lang.String> category)
      Returns a list of all non vegan nor vegetarian filtered recipes. The filter values are defined by json parameters.
      Parameters:
      minTime - Minmal time of the recipe in minutes.
      maxTime - Maximum time of the recipe in minutes.
      category - List of all possible categories for the recipe.
      Returns:
      the filtered list of recipes

    • findOneByJsonParameters

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE total_time <= :maxTime AND total_time > :minTime AND category IN :category AND vegetarian = :vegetarian AND vegan = :vegan ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) Recipe findOneByJsonParameters​(@Param("minTime") int minTime, @Param("maxTime") int maxTime, @Param("category") java.util.List<java.lang.String> category, @Param("vegetarian") boolean vegetarian, @Param("vegan") boolean vegan)

    • findOneByJsonParametersNoneVeganVegetarian

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE total_time <= :maxTime AND total_time > :minTime AND category IN :category ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) Recipe findOneByJsonParametersNoneVeganVegetarian​(@Param("minTime") int minTime, @Param("maxTime") int maxTime, @Param("category") java.util.List<java.lang.String> category)
